amendment.description: To modify the basis on which an extension of the period for enlistment in the Armed Forces may be made under the Delayed Entry Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1100 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1100 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5791-5792) To modify the basis on which an extension of the period for enlistment in the Armed Forces may be made under the Delayed Entry Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1100 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1100 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 1003.
